Compare WHAM models

Source: R/compare_wham_models.R
compare_wham_models.Rd

After fitting multiple WHAM models, compare_wham_models produces a table of AIC and Mohn's rho to aid model comparison.

compare_wham_models(
  mods,
  fname = "model_comparison",
  sort = TRUE,
  calc.rho = TRUE,
  calc.aic = TRUE,
  fdir = getwd(),
  do.print = TRUE
)

Arguments

mods

(named) list of fit WHAM models. If no names are given, "m1", "m2", ... will be used.
fname

character, filename to save CSV results table (.csv will be appended). Default = "model_comparison".
sort

T/F, sort by AIC? Default = TRUE.
calc.rho

T/F, calculate Mohn's rho? Retrospective analysis must have been run for all modes. Default = TRUE.
calc.aic

T/F, calculate AIC? Default = TRUE.
fdir

character, path to directory to save CSV results table. Default = getwd().
do.print

T/F, print table to console? Default = TRUE.

Value

a list with the following components:

daic

Vector of delta-AIC by model

aic

Vector of AIC by model

rho

Matrix of Mohn's rho by model

best

Name of best model (lowest AIC)

tab

Results table of AIC and Mohn's rho

See also

fit_wham

Examples

if (FALSE) {
m1 <- fit_wham(input1)
m2 <- fit_wham(input2)
mods <- list(m1=m1, m2=m2)
res <- compare_wham_models(mods)
res$best
res$tab
}
